vm.config.screen.title: Vein Mine Settings Menu
vm.config.search_radius.tooltip: Range mode search radius, 1 means 8 blocks in all directions (up, down, left, right, diagonals), plus 9 blocks in each of the front and back layers, plus the center block.
vm.config.bfs_limit.tooltip: Set the maximum number of blocks for chain mode search.
vm.config.ignored_blocks.tooltip:
Blocks ignored in chain mode will use range search instead.
Format should be: namespace:path, e.g., minecraft:air
vm.config.use_bfs.tooltip: Enable or disable chain search mode. If disabled, range search mode will be used for all blocks.
vm.config.use_radius_search.tooltip: Enable or disable range search mode. If disabled, range search will never be used.
vm.config.use_radius_search_when_reach_b: Switch to Range Mode When Exceeding Chain Limit

Whether to automatically switch to range mode when the target blocks exceed the chain mode limit.
If disabled, chain mining will not occur when the limit is exceeded.
vm.warn.breakthroughs: Warning! Tool is about to break! Chain mining will not proceed.
vm.config.protect_tools.tooltip:
Enable or disable tool protection. If enabled, a warning will pop up and chain mining will stop when the tool is about to break.
If disabled, chain mining will continue even if the tool is about to break.
vm.config.protected_tools.tooltip:
Tools that will trigger tool protection.
Format should be: namespace:path, e.g., minecraft:diamond_pickaxe
vm.config.protect_allValuable_tools.tool: Whether to automatically protect all valuable tools. If enabled, gold, diamond, and netherite tools will be protected.
vm.config.durability_threshold.tooltip: If the durability after chaining will be below this value, tool protection will be triggered.
